Maurice Poli (2 Disemba 1933 - 26 Eprel 2020) bụ onye France na-eme ihe nkiri, na-arụsi ọrụ ike na mmepụta ndị Ịtali. A na-ewere ya dịka otu n'ime ndị na-eme ihe nkiri olenaole sonyere n'ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ ụdị niile mepụtara na Ịtali n'ihe karịrị afọ iri atọ.
A mụrụ ya na Bizerte, Tunisia, Poli mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 1961, na obere ọrụ na Mauro Bolognini's The Lovemakers

O mechara gbanwee ọrụ ndị isi na ọrụ nkwado, a na-emekarị ya dịka nwoke siri ike ma ọ bụ onye ọjọọ. Ọ bụkwa onye na-eme ihe nkiri na TV, na-arụ ọrụ nkwado na Belle na Sebastian na ọrụ ndu na usoro ndị nledo dị mkpirikpi Frédéric le Gardian. N'ịgbaso ejiji nke oge ahụ maka aha egwu America, na ọkara nke abụọ nke afọ 1960, a kpọrọ ya Monty Greenwood na ọtụtụ Spaghetti Westerns.
Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká, ọ gara biri na Rom, Ịtali ma tinye onwe ya n'ihe omume ntụrụndụ ya nke ndụ ya niile nke geology na archaeology.
